decisions.name: Decision_did_we_activate_any_Back_Care
decisions.label: Decision did we activate any Back Care

rules.name: Yes_Activation_of_BC
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 28 OR 30 OR 34 OR 37 OR 40 OR (10 AND 19) OR (11 AND 20) OR (12 AND 21) OR (13 AND 22) OR (14 AND 23) OR (15 AND 24) OR (16 AND 25) OR (17 AND 26) OR (18 AND 27) OR (29 AND 32) OR (31 AND 33) OR (35 AND 36) OR (38 AND 39) OR (41 AND 42) OR (43 AND 44)
rules.label: Yes - Activation of BC

decisions.name: Decision_did_we_deactivate_any_Back_Care
decisions.label: Decision did we deactivate any Back Care

rules.name: Yes_Deactivation_of_BC
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 10) OR (2 AND 11) OR (3 AND 12) OR (4 AND 13) OR (5 AND 14) OR (6 AND 15) OR (7 AND 16) OR (8 AND 17) OR (9 AND 18) OR (19 AND 21) OR (20 AND 22) OR (23 AND 24) OR (25 AND 26) OR (27 AND 28) OR (29 AND 30)
rules.label: Yes - Deactivation of BC

fields.name: error_message_on_create
fields.fieldText:
Sorry, but you can’t read or update records at this time.

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

Sorry, but you can’t read or update records at this time.

fields.name: Text_back_care
fields.fieldText: You chose to activate back care for some countries. To do so, please respect the following steps

fields.name: Return_address_box
fields.fieldText: Check if return address is filled in BO

validationRule.errorMessage: Please fill the checkbox if the verification is done

fields.name: Text_back_care_0
fields.fieldText: To deactivate Back Ship you need to go in the BackOffice and deactivate it from there.

fields.name: Information_text
fields.fieldText: Please select what actions you would like to handle on this merchant :

validationRule.errorMessage: Please select at least one action

fields.name: Text_test
fields.fieldText: You chose to update existing targeted countries. Choose the TC to update among the list and update one or more fields.

validationRule.errorMessage: For each country selected please select weither "Native speaker", "back care" or wait for the language proficiency test to be validated.
